summary:
This Mod gives the player a new Transformation Spell .
With New , Spell , Voice Power and Weapon .
descriptionHtml:
This Mod gives the player a new Transformation Spell .

You will become Ghost Rider Vengeance 

This New Version 2.00 change everything 
=======================================

- You can change anytime you want and you can revert back as long you like it :p  .

- Now after revert back you will not naked again .
 

# New effect Transformation 
===========================

- New Bound weapon :

* Your  left hand spell conjures Phantom CrossBow : Attack with Phantom CrossBow cause Big Explosion and a new ammo visual ( Phantom Fireball ) . Equipping Phantom Crossbow gives you a new voice spell   \" Revert Back \"  this will turn you back  .

* Your Right hand spell conjures a Phantom Sword , Casting the right hand spell will allow you to summon a secondary sword for your Left hand (dual wield)  . Normal attacks with the Phantom  Sword will cause Stagger  and Elemental Effect . Equipping the Phantom Sword will grant the player a new Voice spell  \" Phantom Sword Dance \" it will absolute kill  with new effect burn . 

- During the effect, all NPCs become hostile.

- Health Regeneration in combat .

- Sneaking will now grant you invisibility , Health Regeneration much faster. 


# LOCATION
============

- You can find the spell inside Whiterun Stable .

 

# REQUIREMENT
================

- Latest Patch and Dawnguard 


Note : if you have old Ghost Rider Transformation Spell please uninstall that one after that you can instal the newest one .


# Recommended  
==================

- Horse Blaze Of Eventide \" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25097 \"


# Installation
=============

Download the relevant main file and extract the contents to your Data folder.


# Uninstallation
================

                     Delete the Ghost Rider .esp 
                     Delete meshes/armor/FireSkull
                     Delete Scripts/GenericPolymorphReversedHandScript.pex
                     Delete texture / armor / thievesguild
                     Delete weapon / sworddance
                     Delete scripts / phantom swap , sound , magic , shout , dual , equip 
                     Delete scripts / sworddance qsme me , book 


# Thanks and Credits
====================

- Newermind43 for giving me permission for using his mod \" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11326\"  

- Bloodmane1 ( texture ) 

- Flippetized ( original Spell )

- Zigurd ( Shadow Spawn Skin ) his mode is awesome \" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11495 \" 

- Gogy28 ( Original weapon from here ) \" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24011 \"

- RavenCane ( Original weapon from here ) \" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1045 \"

- Jackalhead for the guide about Polymorph Transformation Spell \" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15045 \"

- AncientVampire and ZeroFrost for making Nightingale Prime HD 

- Bethesda for Skyrim and CK

- Skyrim Nexus 

- And DinoGoesRawr ( Philip - Level 25 redguard werewolf warrior ) I\'m using his save data for trying this mod because I\'m too busy to play 

========================================================================================================================================================================================


Well this is just for fun , Thank You .
author: MingPaulus

files.name: Ghost Rider Transformation
files.changelogHtml:
New Transformation Effect
New Bound Weapon ( Dual wield )
New Bound Weapon ( Riffle )
New Voice Spell and New Summon Horse Effect
Every Bound Weapon Ghost Rider has it's own unque effect
